title: Jude the Obscure - the word "ancient" serves to

content.prompt: The use of the word “ancient” in sentences 1 and 5 serves to

choices.label: disparage the antiquated practices of a certain period
emphasize the span of human activity through time
point out a contrast between convention and nonconformity
suggest that some country traditions have become outmoded

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the function of setting in a narrative.
